text: Heliophanus splendidus is a jumping spider species in the genus Heliophanus. It was first described by Wanda Wesołowska in 2003 and has been identified in Democratic Republic of the Congo and Nigeria. ==References== Category:Spiders described in 1986 Category:Fauna of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Fauna of Nigeria Category:Salticidae Category:Spiders of Africa Category:Taxa named by Wanda Wesołowska
title: Heliophanus splendidus
